name: HOLY SUMMIT
description:
HOLY SUMMIT is a minimalist detective game by Team Sleepyhead.

You are Detective Lawrence Horseshoe, investigating reports of strange happenings at Fishbone Manor.

Use the arrow keys to move around, and interact with coloured objects by walking into them.

Upon solving the mystery, please interact with the handheld radio in the room with the dead man to finish the game.

If you wish, feedback can be submitted to our guestbook: https://forms.gle/vH5r5PbzrfG9Xy3G9
